üè∑Ô∏è"...This cream puff flavour has a light and fluffy choux pastry taste and a creamy and slightly sweet milky filling. This profile goes well with pastries, cakes, ice creams, and other desserts!" - [Cream Puff (SC) WF](https://www.wonderflavours.com/collections/super-concentrated-flavours/products/cream-puff-sc)

​

Suggested Dilution Ratio: 1-4%

Lot#: M115181

**Single Flavor Test: 4%**

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

​

üîπ SNV Test for Intensity/Flavor:

‚Ä¢ **2%** Mod. Light Flavor ‚ÄúGeneric‚Äù Bakery ‚Äì Negligible & Faint Spice Note Detected

‚Ä¢ **4%** Mod. Strong w Noticeable ‚ÄúSpice‚Äù to Bakery

‚Ä¢ **6%** Stronger but Almost Identical to 4% Tester - Spice Note is Dominate ‚Äì Mouthfeel Fuller but Still Soft Bodied with No Identifiable Off Notes

1 Week Steep

‚ñ∫ Notes

2 ¬Ω Week Steep

‚ñ∫Vape ‚Äì Noticeable Changes

\- Flavor Description: Balanced Combination of a Light\* Dry Pastry ‚ÄúPuff‚Äù Flavor mixed with an equally Mellow note of a Drier\* Neutral Dairy Cream; with a Faint Hint of a warmer dry Spice\*married into overall flavor. Medium Bodied with a Soft & Light Drying Mouthfeel.

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- After 2 ¬Ω weeks Steep: Touch of Spice (Nutmeg?) blended into Overall Flavor ‚Äì Tasted on Inhale & Exhale ‚Ä¢ Below 2% - Spice note Not Clearly Identifiable

\- ‚ÄúPuff‚Äù pastry flavor more Identifiable at 4% vs 2% ‚Ä¢ Not Heavy or Bready\*
